item.description:
SAVE $10 with Meetup!

Regular price is $39.

This is always a fabulous event. The music is extraordinary and you don't have to go far to hear a professional symphony!

Meet for dinner at the Turtle Tavern at 5:45 pm (located next to the Town Hall at 72 Main Street)

If you do not meet us for dinner, meet us at the concert hall at 7:15 pm. Your ticket will be there for you.

Let Freedom Ring

Copland: Lincoln Portrait

Williams: Hymn to the Fallen

Music from Band of Brothers

Thompson: Testament of Freedom

The CHSO's 13th season opener commences with a colorful and poignant salute to democracy and our veterans as the New World Chorale joins forces with the orchestra to celebrate our nation, our freedoms and those that protect them.

$29 per person due by 11/8/12. Price goes up to $39 after 11/8/12

Pay online through this site or send check to: Jacki Rose, PO Box 98, Southboro, MA 01772

Cancellation Policy: If you cancel at least 24 hours in advanceÂ you may get a full credit towards a future concert.
item.name: Claflin Hill Symphony
